job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement scalable and reliable backend systems and infrastructure to support our products
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of building and maintaining software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain our micro-services to expose platform functionality to internal and external clients
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining micro-services is a key aspect of software development, focusing on exposing functionality through APIs.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with development and quality assurance teams to ensure high availability, scalability, and security of our systems
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring system qualities like availability, scalability, and security are integral parts of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with DevOps Engineers to ensure the continuous delivery and deployment of software products
job_tasks.justification: Working with DevOps engineers on continuous delivery and deployment is a direct indicator of operations engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with software developers to identify and implement improvements to our platform architecture and functionality
job_tasks.justification: This involves modifying and enhancing existing software systems, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain documentation of our systems and processes
job_tasks.justification: Documentation is a crucial part of the software development process to ensure understanding and maintainability.

soft_skills.phrase: work closely with our Frontend Engineers, DevOps Engineers, and other stakeholders
Collaborate with development and quality assurance teams
Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies
Mentor and train junior members of the backend team

classification.rationale: This job description focuses on traditional backend engineering, microservices, and general platform infrastructure. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies that would qualify it for a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer profile. Therefore, it falls outside the scope of the provided AI-specific roles.
